title: Influences of THPS on skateboarding culture
description: Explore how the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has influenced the gaming industry and skateboarding culture.

body.raw:
## Introduction

The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has been a staple in the gaming industry since the first game was released in 1999. The series has had a huge impact on the gaming industry and skateboarding culture. In this blog post, we will explore how the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has influenced the gaming industry and skateboarding culture.

## The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series

Here is a table of the most popular games on the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series:

| Game | Release Date         | Platforms                                          | Developer                                     |
| ---- | -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| 1999 | Pro Skater           | Neversoft (PlayStation)                            | Natsume (GBC)                                 |
| 2000 | Pro Skater 2         | Vicarious Visions (GBA)                            | Natsume (GBC)                                 |
| 2001 | Pro Skater 3         | Neversoft (PS2, GCN, Xbox)                         | Vicarious Visions (GBA)                       |
| 2002 | Pro Skater 4         | Neversoft (PS2, GCN, Xbox)                         | Vicarious Visions (GBA, Mobile[13])           |
| 2003 | Underground          | Vicarious Visions (GBA)                            | Jamdat (Mobile)                               |
| 2004 | Underground 2        | Vicarious Visions (GBA)                            | Jamdat (Mobile)                               |
| 2005 | American Wasteland   | Neversoft (PS2, GCN, Xbox, X360)                   | Vicarious Visions (American Sk8land: DS, GBA) |
| 2020 | Pro Skater 1 + 2[16] | Vicarious Visions (Windows, PS4, PS5, XONE, XSX/S) | Turn Me Up Games (Switch)[17]                 |

## The gaming industry

The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has had a huge impact on the gaming industry. The series has been a staple in the gaming industry since the first game was released in 1999. The series has had a huge impact on the gaming industry and skateboarding culture. In this blog post, we will explore how the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has influenced the gaming industry and skateboarding culture.

<Image
  src="/images/blog/blog-two.webp"
  alt="Skateboarding"
  width={718}
  height={404}
/>

## Skateboarding culture

The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has had a huge impact on skateboarding culture. The series has been a staple in the gaming industry since the first game was released in 1999. The series has had a huge impact on the gaming industry and skateboarding culture. In this blog post, we will explore how the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has influenced the gaming industry and skateboarding culture.

## Conclusion

The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has had a huge impact on the gaming industry and skateboarding culture. The series has been a staple in the gaming industry since the first game was released in 1999. The series has had a huge impact on the gaming industry and skateboarding culture. In this blog post, we will explore how the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series has influenced the gaming industry and skateboarding culture.

## References

- [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony*Hawk%27s*(series)](<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Hawk%27s_(series)>)
- [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=60mRoRb3OOs](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=60mRoRb3OOs)
